metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2387 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Pen 0.18.0 has Insecure Temporary File Creation vulnerabilities

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2387` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pen - 0.22.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pen package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.22.1-1').
